channel.title: Compile error, please read
channel.description:
Im not a noob, I have searched, tried, searched, and tried so many damn things to get my compiler working. Let me post ALL that I have done:
Here is my compiler.bat...
[code]@echo off title ApeEscape Compiler color 06 echo /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ echo \ / echo / _-*ApeEscape compiler v1.0*-_ \ echo \ / echo / \ echo \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java echo compiling complete :) pause[/code]
Here is my CLASSPATH: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] PATH: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin[/code]
That is the correct path to my java 1.6.0. And no, it isnt java1.6u1
Here is the error that I recieve STILL!
[code]/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ \ / / _-*ApeEscape compiler v1.0*-_ \ \ / / \ \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options compiling complete :) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
... Help please. YES, I have tried the ultimate compiler. I get the error that I need java files to run the compiler.

item.title: Compile error, please read
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Hmm… let me try one more thing… Change your PATH to

c:\Windows\System32\;”C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin

If that doesn’t work, then I don’t know :\

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error, please read
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:5, topic:89684”]Change your classpath to

C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\

and in your compiler, change

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java

to

"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

and see if that works.[/quote]

thanks for the help sick your a good man =P

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error, please read
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Change your classpath to

C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\

and in your compiler, change

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java

to

"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

and see if that works.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error, please read
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Im not a noob, I have searched, tried, searched, and tried so many damn things to get my compiler working. Let me post ALL that I have done:

Here is my compiler.bat…

[code]@echo off
title ApeEscape Compiler
color 06
echo /////////////////
echo \ /
echo / -ApeEscape compiler v1.0-
echo \ /
echo /
echo /////////////////

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” *.java
echo compiling complete
pause[/code]

Here is my CLASSPATH:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin

That is the correct path to my java 1.6.0. And no, it isnt java1.6u1

Here is the error that I recieve STILL!

/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ \ / / _-*ApeEscape compiler v1.0*-_ \ \ / / \ \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options compiling complete :) Press any key to continue . . .

… Help please. YES, I have tried the ultimate compiler. I get the error that I need java files to run the compiler.

Read full topic
